column5: Wow, thoughts and prayers go out to Cochrane Air Services.... Sad news......  Cochrane air plane crash
Always a sad thing to hear about.   My condolences to the families and friends.
My condolences to family and friends as well.

I heard about this last night before they knew the results - I was really hoping it wasnt going to end this way. Initial reports were a gust of wind flipped it while it was landing and it sank. My condoloences to the family
Wow - that is terrible news.  My Dad and have used them in past to fly to Kesagami and it is usually that day.   My condolences to the families.
That would have to be horrifying.   I too send my condolences to the family and to Cochrane Air.
